response.overview: American Music Awards 50th Anniversary Special, a two-hour retrospective special, will air on Sunday, Oct. 6. It will celebrate the last 50 years with stunning new performances, heartfelt artist interviews, and legendary special guests. It will also showcase exclusive, never-before-seen footage from DCP's vast archives, highlighting iconic moments that have shaped the awards show and influenced pop culture.
response.title: 50th Anniversary Special
